author: clouette
title: Good build and color parts
review:
This set does not look fantastic from the front, but when you build it, it gives a satisfying yet, moc-ing feeling. Due to the modular system released in 2017, with about 5 sets using it, the set screams at you for wanting to moc it. After trying many different layouts and adding my own parts, the primary still look better.

Even the secondary builds look very good. All the builds are highly playable.

The parts are excellence too! I love all the dark red bricks and mason bricks.

The only down side is that this set is not very popular among brickset-ers. The price per part is just average (many small parts).
